summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No.1513, for the improvement of Kilbourne Street, from Corliss Avenue to Ashworth Avenue, by constructing concrete sidewalks, together with crosswalks and other appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 16195 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
